name: Flow Field Particles
description: Basic flow field implementation with particle trails creating organic black lines on white background

name: Interactive Flow Field with Sound
description: Full-screen flow field with audio integration, and colors, featuring white particle trails on black background and wind gust sounds

name: Enhanced Flow Field
description: Full-screen flow field with stronger forces and white particle trails creating dynamic motion patterns

name: Random Walk Lines
description: Generates multiple polyline paths with constrained random steps and center bias, creating organic branching patterns

name: Enhanced Random Walks
description: Variation with more lines, longer paths, and increased step diversity for more complex branching structures

name: Random Walks Duplicate
description: Similar to the previous recreation with identical parameters for random polyline generation

name: Grid of Rotated Squares
description: Grid pattern of squares with subtle rotations and single diagonal lines, inspired by Vera Moln√°r's geometric art

name: Enhanced Geometric Grid
description: More complex grid with greater rotation angles, variable square sizes, and multiple intersecting diagonal lines

name: Sparse Geometric Composition
description: Grid with missing squares, systematic rotations based on position, and intersecting diagonals creating rhythmic patterns
